#include <iostream>
#include <cstring>
#include <vector>
#include <algorithm>
#include <math.h>

using namespace std;

typedef long long LL;

int main()
{

   string s; cin>>s;

    int c1[27]; memset(c1,0,sizeof(c1));

    int ans=0;

        char ansc=125;
        for(int i=0;i<s.length();++i)
        {
                char c=s[i];
                int co=0;int j;
                for( j=i;;++j)
                {
                    if(s[j]!=c) break;

                    ++co;
                }
                i=j-1;
                if(ans<co)
                {
                      ans = co;
                      ansc = c;
                }
                else if(ans==co)
                {
                      ansc = min(ansc,c);
                }

         }

        cout<<ansc<<endl<<ans<<endl;



    return 0;
}
